doc:
Paul Maxey https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Maxey 0 Paul Maxey (1907–1963), was an American actor. Born in Wheaton, Illinois, the rotund Maxey played character roles in films from 1937, notably as the composer Victor Herbert in Till the Clouds Roll By (1946) and was in many TV shows from the 1950s onwards, notably in the role of Mayor John Peoples in the sitcom The People's Choice (1955–1958) and such other shows as M Squad, Wagon Train, Dennis the Menace, The Untouchables , Perry Mason and Lassie before his death in 1963 at age 56. Paul_Maxey ( 1907 – 1963 ) , was an_American_actor . Born in Wheaton , Illinois , the_rotund_Maxey played character_roles in films from 1937 , notably as the_composer_Victor_Herbert in Till the_Clouds_Roll By (_1946_) and was in many_TV_shows from the_1950s_onwards , notably in the_role of Mayor_John_Peoples in the_sitcom The_People 's_Choice_(_1955 – 1958_) and such_other_shows as M_Squad , Wagon_Train , Dennis the_Menace , The_Untouchables_,_Perry_Mason and Lassie before his_death in 1963 at age_56 .
